headline: How Recent Developments Are Rewriting the Story for 3M
summary: 3M's Fair Value Estimate has inched upward, moving from $174.31 to $174.94. This change comes as analysts adjust their outlooks in response to the company’s most recent earnings and strategic developments. There is growing optimism around new product launches and successful turnaround efforts, although these are offset by persistent legal risks. Stay tuned to find out how investors and analysts can continue to track these evolving narratives over time. Analyst Price Targets don't always...
